title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 263.6 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for short taxable periods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 263.6 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for short taxable periods

State Regulations

If a nonresident taxpayer has a short taxable period due to
a change in accounting period, such nonresident taxpayer must file a City of

Yonkers earnings tax return if such taxpayer has any wages earned, or net
earnings from self-employment derived from, within the City of Yonkers during
such short taxable period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
263.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
